Summary: 3 oclock over tree line hanging orb
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around April 30th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving home on 1750 to the east. At first I thought it was a light on top of a drilling rig. The in the same position the light just hung in the same position over the tree line. I realized it was not a light on top of anything. I think it would be 50 to 60 feet off the ground. I was able to see it in the same position until I pulled in to the driveway facing east also. I lost it in the tree line for a second and then was.I got out of the car as fast as I could but it was to late. My wife witnessed the whole thing with me.
